item.title: Central Cabinet Approves 4-Lane Gudebellur-Mahabubnagar on NH-167
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: The Centre has approved the widening of the national highway from Gudebellur to Mahbubnagar on the Hyderabad-Panaji economic corridor to four-lane standard. Work on the 80.01 km stretch of the highway is expected to cost â‚¹3175.08 crore.
The project will be executed in hybrid annuity mode (HAM) under (National Highways (Original) scheme, and was approved by the the Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs (CCEA) on Friday.
The project will provide significant benefit to Narayanpet and M...]]>
item.author: M Srinivas, About The Author
